title: UX/UI & Design Systems
description: User-centric interfaces designed with empathy and precision, focused on conversion.

hero.headline: Design That Converts & Scales
hero.subheadline: User-centric interfaces and design systems that balance aesthetics with usability, all built for growth and consistency.

benefits.title: User-Centered Research
benefits.description: Interviews, personas, journey maps, and usability testing to ground design decisions in real user needs.

benefits.title: Conversion-Driven UI
benefits.description: Every element optimized for clarity, trust, and action based on UX principles and A/B testing.

benefits.title: Scalable Design Systems
benefits.description: Component libraries, design tokens, and documentation that keep teams aligned and shipping faster.

benefits.title: Accessibility by Default
benefits.description: WCAG-compliant patterns, keyboard navigation, and inclusive design from wireframes to production.

benefits.title: Motion & Delight
benefits.description: Purposeful animations and micro-interactions that guide attention without distraction.

benefits.title: Design-to-Dev Handoff
benefits.description: Structured Figma specs, component variants, and responsive rules that engineering can implement directly.

process.title: Research & Strategy
process.description: User interviews, competitive analysis, and UX audits to identify opportunities and constraints.

process.title: Wireframes & Flows
process.description: Low-fidelity wireframes and user flows validated with stakeholders before visual design.

process.title: Visual Design & Prototyping
process.description: High-fidelity mockups in Figma with interactive prototypes for usability testing.

process.title: Design System & Handoff
process.description: Component library, design tokens, and developer-friendly specs for seamless implementation.
